name: Steakhouse Nightmare
description:
Cook steak for people! Send the food before the customers get angry!

How to Play:

1. Cook food by cooking the ingredients: Steak,Bread,Potato,Egg

2. Put the plate first on the preperation station

3. If the ingredients are cooked prepare the food on the plates

4. Food that can be made: Steak-bread, Steak-potato,Steak-egg

5. Ring the bell to send the food to the customers.

6. Throw the food,ingredient,plate if you have full hands or burnt food

Mechanics:

- Send the food before the order expire

- Send as much food before the timer expire

- Change color of your uniform when you have high enough high score

Controls:

W-A-S-D keys & Up-Down-Left-Right arrows = Movement 

Space = Interact
